ModMetaData.name: Children Can Learn Fast
ModMetaData.author: alite
ModMetaData.description:
Simple mod that makes it so children learning rate is affected by the slow study and quick study genes. Both have a 50% impact, similar to the skill learning rate
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/alite/myworkshopfiles/?appid=294100]Easy link to all of my Rimworld mods[/url] [url=https://github.com/KonradHeinser/ChildrenCanLearnFast][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url] [url=https://ko-fi.com/alite56114][img]https://i.imgur.com/Utx6OIH.png[/img][/url]
